TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit UIViewControllerPreviewing_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.
Application developers who want to keep the option to unregister for 3D Touch must store a reference to the instance that is returned by , so that they can later pass it to the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class MonoTouch.UIKit.UIGestureRecognizer GetPreviewingGestureRecognizerForFailureRelationship(class MonoTouch.UIKit.IUIViewControllerPreviewing This) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a gesture recognizer that developers can configure to recognize gestures that will prevent 3D Touch "Peek" gestures from succeeding.
Docs.returns: The gesture recognizer that the developers configured to recognize gestures that will prevent 3D Touch "Peek" gestures from succeeding..

Docs.summary: Gets the area of the screen that remains in focus when the 3D Touch focus/blur effect happens.
Docs.returns: The area of the screen that remains in focus when the 3D Touch focus/blur effect happens.

Docs.returns: The view that is responding to the user's 3D Touch pressure gesture.
